üîß Configuration Steps

  1. Choose an SMTP provider from the options above
  2. Get your SMTP credentials (username, password, host, port)
  3. Update your environment variables:
    • EMAIL_HOST_USER - Your SMTP username
    • EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD - Your SMTP password/app password
    • EMAIL_HOST - SMTP host (optional, defaults to Gmail)
    • EMAIL_PORT - SMTP port (optional, defaults to 587)
    • ADMIN_EMAIL - Email address for admin notifications
  4. Restart your application and test again
